name: marcmap
title: MarcMap
points: Uses Mapbox GL JS API to provide a user friendly map interface
Hosts Express.js Based Backend API to format GTFS-RS Data
Required Binary & Bit Parsing of Data
Involved use npm & node in creating and deploying API

name: Composite
title: Composite
blurb: College comparison tool with a focus on equity.
points: Implements Data from the US Department of Education
Sourced from a live database
Written in JavaScript using the React Framework
Uses Open-Source Libraries for Graphing
Involved Usage of Git CLI and Github CLI
Optimized for Accessibility

name: Caldata
title: Caldata
blurb: Learn about the countries' biggest state.
points: Implements Data from the Californian Goverment and Climate Researchers
Sourced from live and local databases
Written in JavaScript using the React Framework
Data Analysis Conducted with Node.JS
Required SVG-Implementation
Involved Usage of Git CLI and Github CLI
Optimized for Accessibility

name: school_webscraper
title: Lunch Emailer
points: Uses the Requests Library to Read HTML Lunch Menu
Interprets iCal Links and Finds Current Data
Evaluates Performance Metrics
Uses Unix Time Stamp to Handle Date/Time
Hosts IMAP & SMTP Server to Automatically Send HTML-Formatted Emails
Involved Usage of Git CLI and Github CLI

name: cs_club_website
title: CS Club Website
points: Uses CSS & Javascript Based Animations
Uses SQL-Based Personal Data Storage Method
Collected and Incorporated User Feedback
Written in a time-crunch
Involved Usage of Git CLI and Github CLI
